verbs.description: [ARG0: The Trump administration] [V: found] [ARG1: itself] [ARGM-LOC: in a firestorm of controversy] [ARGM-TMP: over the weekend] [ARGM-ADV: over its handling of migrant children] and faced down a torrent of accusations that the government had " lost " 1,475 children . But there 's a lot more to the story than that .
